name: Trenzia

trait.name: Illumination
text: Trenzia sheds either dim light in a 15-foot radius, or bright light in a 15-foot radius and dim light for an additional 15 feet. It can switch between the options as an action.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
text: Trenzia has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Rejuvenation
text: If Trenzia is destroyed, it regains all its hit points in 1 hour unless holy water is sprinkled on its remains or a dispel magic or remove curse spell is cast on them.

trait.name: Spellcasting
text: Trenzia is a 5th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). It requires no somatic or material components to cast its spells. Trenzia has the following wizard spells prepared:

action.name: Fire Ray
text: Ranged Spell Attack: +5 to hit, range 30 ft., one target. 10 (3d6) fire damage.

spells: mage hand, magic missile, shield, blur, flaming sphere, fireball
description: Source: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage p. 32
